content.body: this is a good goal. It'd be good if you ask questions pushing towards this.
what I don't want is for people to say, "OK that means signals have to be DOM" since that would make no sense
jschoi: I encourage you to ask these sorts of questions
content.formatted_body: jschoi: I encourage you to ask these sorts of questions

content.body: just keeping in mind avoiding those particular sorts of confusion
Really appreciate both of your comments and questions on this presentation!

When littledan said he saw multiple ways to layer better with Observable and AbortController, e.g., integrating EventTarget as HTML integration on top of ES stuff, and the possibility of a new API that’s user-friendlier than AbortController, I got pretty excited.
content.formatted_body: When littledan said he saw multiple ways to layer better with Observable and AbortController, e.g., integrating EventTarget as HTML integration on top of ES stuff, and the possibility of a new API that’s user-friendlier than AbortController, I got pretty excited.
